explanation: The page provides information on how to apply for a Betriebsnummer in the VeVA-Online database.
The page offers educational programs where students can learn to program Ozobot and Sphero Mini robots.
The page describes an IMS Praktikum where participants develop, test, and maintain IT solutions, including software for various applications.
The page provides instructions on how to reschedule a vehicle inspection appointment online through the iDispo system.

The page describes an online Coffee Lecture about ChatGPT and other artificial intelligences, focusing on their capabilities and challenges. The event takes place via the Zoom video-conferencing software.

The page discusses the e-Learning course "FE Transfer," which is a web-based training course for the application of the Finite Element Method (FEM) in structural mechanics and mechanical engineering. The course uses specially developed e-Learning software.
